adrFormatAddress: 1149 1st Ave., New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: The best threading salon around here. Falguni is always so nice. The entire team care that you are happy with your service. I have been coming here since the day it opened, and I have to say I just walked out of there happy. This salon is somewhere you should definitely visit if you need beauty services. It’s very economical with flexibility in appointments.

originalText.text: I’ve been going to this salon for years and I love it!  Falguni is friendly, clean and very professional!!! I mostly go for waxing and eyebrow threading. Also they offer an amazing head and scalp massage. Highly recommend this salon.

text.text: I’ve been going to this salon for years and I love it!  Falguni is friendly, clean and very professional!!! I mostly go for waxing and eyebrow threading. Also they offer an amazing head and scalp massage. Highly recommend this salon.

originalText.text: Shinny Threading is the only place I trust to do a good job on my eyebrows. The facials are a great value and leave your skin feeling great as well! 10/10.

text.text: Shinny Threading is the only place I trust to do a good job on my eyebrows. The facials are a great value and leave your skin feeling great as well! 10/10.

originalText.text: I have been doing body waxing  here once a month since this salon opened. It is wonderful! The whole experience is so relaxing.

text.text: I have been doing body waxing  here once a month since this salon opened. It is wonderful! The whole experience is so relaxing.

originalText.text: I went to Mona on a Saturday morning the tinting and threading was perfect she did my brows perfect I get so many complements, My new go to for beauty !!! The space is clean and well kept !!
